rule: The sentences must remain grammatically correct after the addition of the formatting tags.
input: Time flies by. Seasons change quietly. Flowers bloom beautifully.
validityText:
The input "Time flies by. Seasons change quietly. Flowers bloom beautifully." consists of three distinct sentences. Each sentence is separated by a period, which is a standard indicator of the end of a sentence. The input, therefore, contains three sentences and is a paragraph of text. According to the input specification, which requires the text to be a paragraph containing at least three sentences, this input complies with the given rules. 

No violation.
OK
coverageText:
